yapanaya nallur kowila pare padinchi 80 wana wiye pasuwana ke.nadeshan mahatha yapanaya sinhala maha widyalaye awasan widuhalpathiwarayayi.1970 wasare upa guruwarayeku lesa yapanaya sinhala maha widyalayata paminena nadeshan mahatha 1993 wasare di ehi widuhalpathiwaraya lesa path wana athara, 1995 wana thek pasala pawathwagena yamata katayuthu kara atha. “94 awurudda wena kota lamayi 11 denek samanya pela panthiye hitiya.ee aya okkoma demala lamayi.ee aya samanya pela wibhagayata peni hitiyata passe lamayi nathi nisa apita pasala wasa damanna wuna.hithata hari wedanawak danuna.awasaneta ithiri wune,mamayi,piyadasa saryi,wama dewan kiyana widya ugannapu sar witharayi.apita ehema demala pasal walata transar hamba wuna.ithin,onna ohomayi sinhala pasala yuddhaya nisa abhawayata giye.”kara thibe.
